ValidationRule.description: Reg B Dates cannot be in the future
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $User.No_Workflow__c = false && $User.No_Validation__c =false && OR(Application_Date__c > TODAY() , Incomplete_Date__c > TODAY() , cm_Completed_Application__c > TODAY() , Appraisal_Delivered_Date__c > TODAY() , Appraisal_Waived_Date__c > TODAY() , Right_To_Copy_Of_Appraisal_Sent_Date__c > TODAY() , Withdrawn_Date__c > TODAY() , Declined_Date__c > TODAY() , Approval_Advised_Sent_Date__c > TODAY() , Term_Sheet_RFI_Date__c > TODAY() )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Reg B Dates cannot be in the future
